name: py-pynndescent

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PyNNDescent is a Python nearest neighbor descent for approximate nearest
neighbors.

dependencies.name: py-llvmlite
dependencies.description: A lightweight LLVM python binding for writing JIT compilers

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-umap-learn
dependent_to.description:
Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP) is a dimension
reduction technique that can be used for visualisation similarly to
t-SNE, but also for general non-linear dimension reduction.
